cards.title: Sport picture of the day / Red sky at night, not Red Sox delight
cards.rawTitle: Red sky at night, not Red Sox delight

item.title: Sport picture of the day: red sky at night, not Red Sox delight
item.trailText: A dramatic sunset illumines the sky above Fenway Park in Boston, Massachusetts as the Boston Red Sox take on the Baltimore Orioles
item.standFirst: A dramatic sunset illumines the sky above Fenway Park in Boston, Massachusetts as the Boston Red Sox take on the Baltimore Orioles. Unfortunately for the home side the gloom continued on the pitch as the Red Sox lost 6-4

displayImages.altText: A dramatic sunset illumines the sky during a game between the Boston Red Sox and the Baltimore Orioles at Fenway Park in Boston, Massachusetts
displayImages.cleanCredit: Photograph: Michael Ivins/Boston Red Sox/Getty Images
